Articles.Content:
ok, so when I load ksp and when I get to the main menu, everything is good but not the frame rate. its not because I have a bad computer(I have an awesome computer). the fps goes to about 10 fps and I don't know why.if anyone knows why it does this, then please let me know.

thanks in advance:)

I would need more information. What mods are you using, KSP version, 32-bit or 64-bit, do you have an output log, does it run fine on an Unmodded KSP install, what is your definition of an Awesome computer. 

See the link below, might be able to give more advice after.

2 hours ago, Barar said:

I would need more information. What mods are you using, KSP version, 32-bit or 64-bit, do you have an output log, does it run fine on an Unmodded KSP install, what is your definition of an Awesome computer. 

See the link below, might be able to give more advice after.

 

thanks for replying but I fixed it, thanks for your help though:)
